articles.title: Gautam Adani is now richer than Mukesh Ambani and Warren Buffett - Quartz
articles.description: The Adani Group is India’s largest closely-held thermal coal producer and coal trader.
articles.content:
Coal billionaire Gautam Adani has become the fifth richest man in the world.
The 59-year-old Adani Group chairman, with his net worth surging to $122.2 billion, has overtaken investor Warren Buffett… [+615 chars]
